reviewText: Torgar\'s Quest is a fantastic retro dungeon crawler that is deceptively simple in its controls. Once you start playing it, you can\'t help but keep going deeper into the dungeons. Addictively fun.
voteText: 3 of 4 people (75%) found this review helpful

reviewText: A fun, bug-free, fully released indy game made by people who obviously care.  Good if you enjoy dungeon crawls.
voteText: 4 of 7 people (57%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Need a quick dungeon crawl with some replayability? Get this!

reviewText: Excellent roguelike, true to the genre. You truly can play at your own pace as it features a system similar to Super Hot - IE your enemies only move when you do. Try it on nightmare to get your ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ smashed. 10/10 would recommend.
voteText: 3 of 6 people (50%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Uncomplicated game, but Fun. The commentary from the character, Torgar, is great! love it!
